The basic aim and objective of this festival is to uplift and promote the rich cultural heritage of the Ranglong community which is on the verge of extinction. Through this festival the past culture and tradition (dance, folksong, folklore, games and sport) of Ranglong which has been handed down by our predecessors will be revived. This festival will act as a mechanism to prevent the young generations from diverse social evils like, gambling, drug addiction, alcoholism, etc.
